alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Kerr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 12:20AM CDT until April 23 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Kerr County in south central Texas... Eastern Edwards County in south central Texas... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1219 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles west of Kerr Wildlife Management Area, or 23 miles south of Junction, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hunt and Kerr Wildlife Management Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
